thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 12 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-TDC Has Been Approached By A Potential Bidder For All Shares

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-TDC Has Been Approached By A Potential Bidder For All Shares
text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - TDC:
* : TDC HAS BEEN APPROACHED BY A POTENTIAL BIDDER FOR ALL SHARES OF TDC
* THERE CAN BE NO CERTAINTY THAT CURRENT DISCUSSIONS WILL LEAD TO POTENTIAL BIDDER MAKING AN OFFER
* SAYS ‍THERE CAN BE NO CERTAINTY THAT CURRENT DISCUSSIONS WILL LEAD TO POTENTIAL BIDDER MAKING AN OFFER​
* WOULD INTEND TO WITHDRAW ITS RECOMMENDATION OF TRANSACTION WITH MTG
* SAYS ‍TDC HAS COMMUNICATED THAT TDC‘S BOARD OF DIRECTORS WOULD INTEND TO WITHDRAW ITS RECOMMENDATION OF TRANSACTION WITH MTG TO COMBINE MTG‘S NORDIC ENTERTAINMENT AND STUDIOS BUSINESSES WITH TDC IF AN OFFER FOR ALL SHARES OF TDC IS MADE​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
